content: my version of a ribbed side to side hat this pattern uses short row and has pictures to help guide you through this very easy it is designed to fold up and have a brim sizes newborn toddler child adult adult large pictures - me in adult/green my 5 yo in toddler/pink it looks tight on her but i got it on my head as well and it didn t feel as tight as it looked the adult uses about half a skein of heartland yarn approx 150 yards i am not exact on this i should try to make another adult hat and see if the skein does in fact allow for two adult hats i will update any questions or comments or especially feedback about how the sizing works for you let me know
